attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royal Mail provides essentail key services to the British Industries and the public.
As a student doing a correspondance course I am forced to put my studies on hold while the strikes are on. 
Hundreds of businesses suffer in virtual silence. 
You have the chief of the arm saying soilders should be getting post for free. 
I can't even get post I pay for in a reasonable time. It proves that the government is out of touch. 
Royal Mail should be investigated by the monopolies commission.
The handling of the privatisation of Royal mail is a joke.

A competent postal service is essential to creating a greener Britian.

No one benefits from the strikes, no one. 

Its a disgrace to the crown and postal laws need a shake up to protect the consumer.
